docs.snippet: In Japan, tennis fans rejoiced as Kei Nishikori became the first man from Japan, and Asia, to reach a Grand Slam final....
docs.lead_paragraph: In Japan, tennis fans rejoiced as Kei Nishikori became the first man from Japan, and Asia, to reach a Grand Slam final.
docs.abstract: Tennis fans across Japan revel in victory of Kei Nishikori at United States Open, a first for a Japanese player, and for a man from Asia; his stardom in his native Japan is unmatched, even though he has not lived there full time for years; since he was 14, he has made Florida his home.

headline.seo: Tennis Fans Rejoice After Kei Nishikori’s Win Over Novak Djokovic

docs.lead_paragraph: Marvin Gonzalez waves to shopkeepers as he enjoys a morning walk through the sunny, working-class resort of Ilopango. His cellphone rings nonstop with residents seeking his support for anything from dealing with a drunk who won't pay his bar bill to reporting an attempted rape.
